speaker: COUNTESS
text: Come on, sir. I shall now put you to the

speaker: COUNTESS
text: height of your breeding.

speaker: FOOL
text: I will show myself highly fed and lowly taught. I

speaker: FOOL
text: know my business is but to the court.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: “To the court”? Why, what place make you

speaker: COUNTESS
text: special when you put off that with such contempt?

speaker: COUNTESS
text: “But to the court”?

speaker: FOOL
text: Truly, madam, if God have lent a man any manners,

speaker: FOOL
text: he may easily put it off at court. He that cannot

speaker: FOOL
text: make a leg, put off ’s cap, kiss his hand, and

speaker: FOOL
text: say nothing, has neither leg, hands, lip, nor cap;

speaker: FOOL
text: and indeed such a fellow, to say precisely, were

speaker: FOOL
text: not for the court. But, for me, I have an answer

speaker: FOOL
text: will serve all men.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Marry, that’s a bountiful answer that fits all

speaker: COUNTESS
text: questions.

speaker: FOOL
text: It is like a barber’s chair that fits all buttocks:

speaker: FOOL
text: the pin-buttock, the quatch-buttock, the brawn-buttock,

speaker: FOOL
text: or any buttock.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Will your answer serve fit to all questions?

speaker: FOOL
text: As fit as ten groats is for the hand of an attorney,

speaker: FOOL
text: as your French crown for your taffety punk, as

speaker: FOOL
text: Tib’s rush for Tom’s forefinger, as a pancake for

speaker: FOOL
text: Shrove Tuesday, a morris for May Day, as the nail

speaker: FOOL
text: to his hole, the cuckold to his horn, as a scolding

speaker: FOOL
text: quean to a wrangling knave, as the nun’s lip to the

speaker: FOOL
text: friar’s mouth, nay, as the pudding to his skin.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Have you, I say, an answer of such fitness

speaker: COUNTESS
text: for all questions?

speaker: FOOL
text: From below your duke to beneath your constable,

speaker: FOOL
text: it will fit any question.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: It must be an answer of most monstrous

speaker: COUNTESS
text: size that must fit all demands.

speaker: FOOL
text: But a trifle neither, in good faith, if the learned

speaker: FOOL
text: should speak truth of it. Here it is, and all that

speaker: FOOL
text: belongs to ’t. Ask me if I am a courtier; it shall do

speaker: FOOL
text: you no harm to learn.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: To be young again, if we could! I will be a

speaker: COUNTESS
text: fool in question, hoping to be the wiser by your

speaker: COUNTESS
text: answer. I pray you, sir, are you a courtier?

speaker: FOOL
text: O Lord, sir!—There’s a simple putting off. More,

speaker: FOOL
text: more, a hundred of them.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Sir, I am a poor friend of yours that loves

speaker: COUNTESS
text: you.

speaker: FOOL
text: O Lord, sir!—Thick, thick. Spare not me.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: I think, sir, you can eat none of this homely

speaker: COUNTESS
text: meat.

speaker: FOOL
text: O Lord, sir!—Nay, put me to ’t, I warrant you.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: You were lately whipped, sir, as I think.

speaker: FOOL
text: O Lord, sir!—Spare not me.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Do you cry “O Lord, sir!” at your whipping,

speaker: COUNTESS
text: and “spare not me”? Indeed your “O Lord, sir!” is

speaker: COUNTESS
text: very sequent to your whipping. You would answer

speaker: COUNTESS
text: very well to a whipping if you were but bound to ’t.

speaker: FOOL
text: I ne’er had worse luck in my life in my “O Lord,

speaker: FOOL
text: sir!” I see things may serve long but not serve ever.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: I play the noble huswife with the time to

speaker: COUNTESS
text: entertain it so merrily with a fool.

speaker: FOOL
text: O Lord, sir!—Why, there ’t serves well again.

speaker: COUNTESS
text:
An
               
              end
              ,
               
              sir
              .
               
              To
               
              your
               
              business
              .
               
              Give
               
              Helen
               
              this
              ,

speaker: COUNTESS
text:
And
               
              urge
               
              her
               
              to
               
              a
               
              present
               
              answer
               
              back
              .

speaker: COUNTESS
text:
Commend
               
              me
               
              to
               
              my
               
              kinsmen
               
              and
               
              my
               
              son
              .

speaker: COUNTESS
text:
This
               
              is
               
              not
               
              much
              .

speaker: FOOL
text: Not much commendation to them?

speaker: COUNTESS
text:
Not
               
              much
               
              employment
               
              for
               
              you
              .
               
              You
               
              understand
               
              me
              .

speaker: FOOL
text: Most fruitfully. I am there before my legs.

speaker: COUNTESS
text: Haste you again.
